ExportDifferential.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_ProductReview WHERE w2_ProductReview.date_changed >= @date_changed ORDER BY w2_ProductReview.shop_id ASC, w2_ProductReview.product_id ASC, w2_ProductReview.review_no ASC
